name: Not Not
description: It's 3am and I'm tired so I'll keep it short. First and foremost this is a terminal game. I may port it to a stand-alone application eventually, but as of now it's not happening. Second, I would like to apologize for the levels. These were all made last minute and I can't say how good they are because there wasn't any time to play test them. In any case I hope you enjoy it.
